articles.title: Layden Blocker, No. 28 recruit in 2023 ESPN 100 college basketball rankings, commits to Arkansas Razorbacks - ESPN
articles.description: Layden Blocker, the No. 28 recruit -- and seventh-ranked point guard -- in the ESPN 100 for 2023, has committed to Arkansas, who had the No. 2 recruiting class in 2022.
articles.content:
